Class DatabaseIndividualReport

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.database.DatabaseIndividualReport
public class DatabaseIndividualReport extends Object
The DatabaseIndividualReport class contains methods for retrieving information about students, courses, attendance summaries, and more from the database. This class focuses on operations involving a specific student or teacher.

  • Method Details

    • getCourseNamesForStudent

      public static List<String> getCourseNamesForStudent(int studentId)
      Retrieves a list of course names associated with a specific student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      Returns:
      A list of course names the student is enrolled in.

    • getCourseNamesForStudent

      public static List<String> getCourseNamesForStudent(int studentId, int teacherId)
      Retrieves a list of course names associated with a specific student and teacher.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher.
      Returns:
      A list of course names the student is enrolled in under the specified teacher.

    • getStudentById

      public static Student getStudentById(int studentId, int teacherId)
      Retrieves detailed information about a specific student under a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher.
      Returns:
      A Student object containing detailed information about the student, or null if not found.

    • getAttendanceSummaryForStudent

      public static List<ClassAttendanceSummary> getAttendanceSummaryForStudent(int studentId, int teacherId)
      Retrieves attendance summary for each class of a specific student under a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher.
      Returns:
      A list of ClassAttendanceSummary objects.

    • getMonthlyAttendanceSummaryForStudent

      public static List<ClassAttendanceSummary.MonthlyAttendanceSummary> getMonthlyAttendanceSummaryForStudent(int studentId, int teacherId)
      Retrieves monthly attendance summary for a specific student under a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher.
      Returns:
      A list of MonthlyAttendanceSummary objects.

    • getStudentsForCurrentTeacherClass

      public static List<Student> getStudentsForCurrentTeacherClass(String courseName, String section, String program)
      Retrieves a list of students for a teacher's specific class, filtered by course name, section, and program.
      Parameters:
      courseName - The name of the course.
      section - The section of the class.
      program - The program of the class.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects matching the criteria.
